content: use the free andromeda doily crochet pattern to make a fabulous doily and add a unique touch to your home decor or make charming gifts for your friends it is a nice size for just about anywhere around the home from the living room to the bedrooms you can make it in a variety of colors and with different yarn weights it will look amazing in every color and size i made my andromeda doily with cotton thread size 20 and a 1 25 mm crochet hook it measures 15 cm 5 9 inches in diameter
